GV06apsulb_u:3: pṛṣṭhyāntayorantau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimitaṃ karoti ||
GV06apsulb_u:8: dīrghasyākṣṇayārajjuḥ pārśvamānī tiryaṅmānī ca yat pṛthagbhute kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti tābhir jñeyābhir uktaṃ viharaṇam || ĀpŚus_1.4b ||
GV06apsulb_u:11: pramāṇaṃ tṛtīyena vardhayet tac caturthenātmacatustriṃśonena saviśeṣaḥ ||
GV06apsulb_u:13: pramāṇamātrīṃ rajjum ubhayataḥ pāśāṃ karoti || ĀpŚus_1.7b ||
GV06apsulb_u:14: madhye lakṣaṇam ardhamadhyamayoś ca pṛṣṭhyāyāṃ rajjum āyamya pāśayorlakṣaṇeṣviti śaṅkūn nihaty upāntyayoḥ pāśau pratimucya madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nimittaṃ karoti |
GV06apsulb_u:15: madhyame pāśau pratimucya, uparyupari nimittaṃ madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṃsam āyacchet
GV06apsulb_u:16: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya madhyamenaiva lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:19: pṛṣṭhyāntayor madhye ca śaṅkūn nihatyārdhe 'rdhe tadviśeṣam abhyasya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvārdhamagamayet
GV06apsulb_u:20: antyayoḥ pāśau kṛtvā madhyame saviśeṣaṃ pratimucya pūrvasminn itaraṃ lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṅkam āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:21: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya lakṣaṇenaiva dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet |
GV06apsulb_u:23: pramāṇaṃ tiryag dvikaraṇy āyāmas tasyākṣṇayārajjus trikaraṇī || ĀpŚus_2.2
GV06apsulb_u:31: caturaśrāc caturaśraṃ nirjihīrṣan yāvan nirjihīrṣet tasya karaṇyā varṣīyaso vṛddhramullikhet vṛrdhasya pārśvamānīm akṣṇayetarat pārśvam upasaṃharet || ĀpŚus_2.5b ||
GV06apsulb_u:32: sā yatra nipatet tad apacchindyāt || ĀpŚus_2.5c ||
GV06apsulb_u:34: upasaṃhṛtākṣaṇayārajjuḥ sā catuṣkaraṇī chinnā cetarā ca yat pṛthagbhūte kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti || ĀpŚus_2.6a ||
GV06apsulb_u:37: dīrghacaturaśraṃ samacaturaśraṃ cikīrṣan tiryaṅmānyāpacchidya śeṣaṃ vibhajyobhayata upadadhyāt khaṇḍam āgantunā saṃpurayet || ĀpŚus_2.7b ||
GV06apsulb_u:39: samacaturaśraṃ dīrghacaturaśraṃ cukīrṣanā yāvaccikīrṣet tāvatīṃ pārśvamānīṃ kṛtvā yadadhikaṃ syād yathāyogam upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_3.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:40: caturaśraṃ maṇḍalaṃ cikīrṣan madhyāt koṭyāṃ nipātayet || ĀpŚus_3.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:41: pārśvataḥ parikṛṣyātiśayatṛtīyena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet || ĀpŚus_3.2b
GV06apsulb_u:44: maṇḍalaṃ caturaśraṃ cikīrṣan viṣkambhaṃ pañcadaśa bhāgān kṛtvā dvāv uddharet |
GV06apsulb_u:51: yāvatpramāṇā rajjus tāvatastāvato vargān karoti || ĀpŚus_3.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:55: yac ca tena caturaśraṃ kriyate tat koṭyām || ĀpŚus_3.9b ||
GV06apsulb_u:59: āgnyādheyike vihāre gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarāle vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_4.1a
GV06apsulb_u:63: caturviṃśatyām aparimite yāvatā vā cakṣuṣā manyate tasmān nātidūram ādheya iti sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa śrūyate || ĀpŚus_4.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:64: dakṣiṇataḥ purastād vitṛtīyadeśe gārhapatyasya nedīyasi dakṣiṇāgner vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_4.3
GV06apsulb_u:65: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarālaṃ pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā vā saṃvibhajya ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ vā bhāgam āgantum upasamasya samaṃ traidhaṃ vibhajyāparasmiṃs tṛtīye lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti tad dakṣiṇāgner āyatanam |
GV06apsulb_u:67: yajamānamātrī prācy aparimitā vā yathāsannāni havīṃṣi saṃbhaved evaṃ tiraścī prāñcau vedyaṃsāv unnayati |
GV06apsulb_u:68: pratīcī śroṇī purastād aṃhīyasī paścāt prathīyasī madhye saṃnatataraivam iva hi yoṣeti dārśikyā veder vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_4.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:69: apareṇāhavanīyaṃ yajamānamātrī dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya tāvatīṃ rajjum āyamya madhye lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇayoḥ śroṇyaṃsayor antarā niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti |
GV06apsulb_u:73: tiryaṅmānīṃ dviguṇāṃ tathā kṛtvā paścāt purastāc copalikhet |
GV06apsulb_u:76: triṃśat padāni prakramā vā paścāttiraśvī bhavati |
GV06apsulb_u:77: ṣaṭtriṃśat prācī caturviṃśatiḥ purastāt tiraścīti saumikyā veder vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_5.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:78: ṣaṭtriṃśikāyām aṣṭādaśopasamasya aparasmād antād dvādaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ pañcadaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhyāntayor antau niyamya pañcadaśakena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nihantyevam uttarataḥśroṇī |
GV06apsulb_u:93: dakṣiṇasmād aṃsād dvādaśasu dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyāṃ nipātayet |
GV06apsulb_u:97: saumikyā veditṛtīyadeśe yajeteti sautrāmaṇyā veder vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_5.8a
GV06apsulb_u:98: prakramāsya dvikaraṇī prakramasthānīyā bhavati trikaraṇyā vā || ĀpŚus_5.8b
GV06apsulb_u:101: trīṇi caturviṃśāni padaśatāni sautrāmaṇikī vediḥ || ĀpŚus_5.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:102: dvistāvā vedir bhavatīty aśvamedhe vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_5.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:107: eṣa hi ceṣṭānāṃ kartā bhavati || ĀpŚus_6.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:108: rathamātrī nirūḍhapaśubandhasya vedir bhavatīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_6.3a ||
GV06apsulb_u:109: tasya khalvāhū rathākṣamātrī paścāt tiryag īṣayā prācī |
GV06apsulb_u:116: ṣaḍaśītiyugaṃ cāsya rathaścāraṇa ucyate iti rathaparimāṇam || ĀpŚus_6.5b ||
GV06apsulb_u:117: aratnibhir vā caturbhiḥ paścāt ṣaḍbhiḥ prācī tribhiḥ purastāt |
GV06apsulb_u:118: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamya dvābhyām adhyardheneti śroṇyaṃsān nirharet || ĀpŚus_6.6
GV06apsulb_u:119: yajamānamātrī catuḥsraktir bhavatīti paitṛkyā veder vijñāyate,
GV06apsulb_u:120: tadekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet || ĀpŚus_6.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:122: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet || ĀpŚus_6.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:123: tāṃ yugena yajamānasya vā padair vimāya śamyayā parimimīte || ĀpŚus_6.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:124: pade yuge 'ratnāv iyati śamyāyāṃ ca mānārtheṣu yathākāmī śabdārthasya
GV06apsulb_u:128: navāratni tiryak saptaviṃśatir udag āyatam iti sadaso vijñāyate ||
GV06apsulb_u:132: aratnimātraṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya sraktiṣu śaṅkūn nihatyārdhaprādeśena taṃ taṃ parilikhec chrutisāmarthyāt vyāyāmamātrī bhavatīti gārhapatyaciter vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_7.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:134: karaṇaṃ vyāyāmasya tṛtīyāyāmaṃ saptamavyāsaṃ kārayet || ĀpŚus_7.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:137: maṇḍalāyāṃ mṛdo dehaṃ kṛtvā madhye śaṅkuṃ nihatyārdhavyāyāmena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet || tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvat sambhavet tan navadhā vyavalikhya traidham ekaikaṃ pradhikaṃ vibhajet || ĀpŚus_7.10b ||
GV06apsulb_u:138: upadhāne caturaśrasyāvāntaradeśān prati sraktīḥ sampādayet || ĀpŚus_7.11a
GV06apsulb_u:140: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_7.11c ||
GV06apsulb_u:143: mṛdo dehān kṛtvāgnīdhrīyaṃ navadhā vyavalikhya, ekasyāḥ sthāne 'śmānam
GV06apsulb_u:145: yathāsaṅkhyam itarā vyavalikhya yathāyogam upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_7.15 ||
GV06apsulb_u:146: bhavatīva khalu vā eṣa yo 'gniṃ cinute iti vijñāyate |
GV06apsulb_u:147: vayasāṃ vā eṣa pratimayā cīyata ityākṛticodanāt |
GV06apsulb_u:149: yāvadāmnānena veṇunā caturaśre ātmani puruṣān avamimote || ĀpŚus_8.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:150: puruṣaṃ dakṣiṇe pakṣe puruṣaṃ pucche puruṣam uttare || ĀpŚus_8.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:154: ekavidhaḥ prathamo 'gnir dvividho dvitīyas trividhas tṛtīyaḥ ta evam
GV06apsulb_u:156: tad u ha vai saptavidham eva cinvīta |
GV06apsulb_u:158: tata ūrdhvam ekottarān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_8.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:161: aṣṭavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ yad anyat saptabhyas tat saptadhā vibhajya pratipuruṣam āveśayet || ĀpŚus_8.6a
GV06apsulb_u:163: puruṣamātreṇa vimimīte' veṇunā vimimīte, iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_8.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:164: yāvān yajamāna ūrdhvabāhus tāvad antarāle veṇoś chidre karoti madhye tṛtīyam || ĀpŚus_8.8
GV06apsulb_u:165: apareṇa yūpāvaṭadeśam anupṛṣṭhyaṃ veṇuṃ nidhāya chidreṣu śaṅkūn nihatyonmucyāparābhyāṃ dakṣiṇāprāk parilikhed āntāt || ĀpŚus_8.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:166: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya dakṣiṇā pratyakparilikhed āntāt ||
GV06apsulb_u:167: unmucya veṇuṃ madhyame śaṅkāv antyaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucyoparyupari lekhāsamaraṃ dakṣiṇā veṇuṃ nidhāyāntye chidre śaṅkuṃ nihatya tasmin madhyamaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucya lekhāntayor itare pratiṣṭhāpya chidrayoḥ śaṅkū nihanti || ĀpŚus_9.1a ||
GV06apsulb_u:169: evaṃ puradakṣiṇaṃ catura ātmani puruṣānavamimīte || ĀpŚus_9.2a ||
GV06apsulb_u:172: aratninā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇam ity uktam || ĀpŚus_9.2c ||
GV06apsulb_u:173: pṛṣṭhyāto vā puruṣamātrasyākṣṇayā veṇuṃ nidhāya pūrvasminn itaram |
GV06apsulb_u:177: rajjvā vā vimāyottaravedinyāyena veṇunā vimimīte || ĀpŚus_9.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:182: puruṣasya pañcamo bhāga ekataḥ prādeśa ekataḥ tat tṛtīyam || ĀpŚus_9.6b ||
GV06apsulb_u:185: ūrvdhvapramāṇamiṣṭakānāṃ jānoḥ jānoḥ pañcamena kārayet || ĀpŚus_9.7a ||
GV06apsulb_u:187: yat pacyamānānāṃ pratihrasīta purīṣeṇa tat sampūrayed aniyataparimāṇatvāt purīṣasya || ĀpŚus_9.8
GV06apsulb_u:188: upadhāne 'dhyardhā daśa purastāt pratīcīr ātmany upadadhāti |
GV06apsulb_u:191: pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayās tāsām ardheṣṭakāmātrāṇi pakṣayor bhavanti || ĀpŚus_10.1b ||
GV06apsulb_u:192: pañcapañca pucchapārśvayor dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_10.1c ||
GV06apsulb_u:193: pucche prādeśam upadhāya sarvam agniṃ pañcamabhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet ||
GV06apsulb_u:195: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā daśa dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāti |
GV06apsulb_u:197: yathā prathame prastāre pakṣau tathā puccham |
GV06apsulb_u:198: yathā pucchaṃ tathā pakṣau viparītā apyaye || ĀpŚus_10.4b ||
GV06apsulb_u:201: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_10.6b ||
GV06apsulb_u:203: pañcabhiḥ purīṣair abhyūhatīti purīṣāntā citir arthāntaratvāt purīṣasya || ĀpŚus_10.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:204: jānudaghnīṃ sāhasraṃ cinvīta prathamaṃ cinvānaḥ || ĀpŚus_10.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:205: nābhidaghnīṃ dviṣāhasraṃ dvitīyam āsyadaghnīṃ triṣāhasraṃ tṛtīyam uttaram uttaraṃ jyāyāmsam mahāntaṃ bṛhantam aparimitaṃ svargakāmaś cinvīteti vijñāyate ||
GV06apsulb_u:207: triṣāhasra triprastārāś caturthaprabhṛtiṣv āhāreṣu nityam iṣṭakāparimāṇam || ĀpŚus_10.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:208: vijñāyate ca ḥna jyāyāṃsaṃ citvā kanīyāṃsaṃ cinvīteti' || ĀpŚus_10.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:211: pādamātrayo bhavanti aratnimātrayo bhavanty ūrvasthimātrayo bhavanty aṇūkamātrayo bhavantīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_11.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:218: sandhyoś ca tadvad ātmānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulāpetāḥ || ĀpŚus_11.5a ||
GV06apsulb_u:219: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīciś ca || ĀpŚus_11.5b ||
GV06apsulb_u:221: pucche prādeśamupadhāya sarvam agniṃ caturbhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet ||
GV06apsulb_u:223: aparasmin prastāre pucchāpyaye pañcamabhāgīyā viśayāḥ || ĀpŚus_11.9a ||
GV06apsulb_u:224: tā ātmani caturdaśabhiḥ pādair yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_11.9b ||
GV06apsulb_u:227: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_11.11b ||
GV06apsulb_u:229: pādeṣṭakāś ca vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_12.1b
GV06apsulb_u:230: ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ prathamāhāreṇa dvitīyena tṛtīyeneti yo yujyeta |
GV06apsulb_u:233: praugacitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_12.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:234: yāvānagniḥ sāratniprādeśo dvistāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ caturaśrāṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāc chroṇīṃ pratyālikhet |
GV06apsulb_u:238: ubhayayaḥ praugaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta prajātān bhrātṛvyān nudeya pratijaniṣyamāṇān iti vijñāyate yathā vimukhe śakaṭe || ĀpŚus_12.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:239: tāvad eva tīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya pūrvāparayoḥ karaṇyor ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet
GV06apsulb_u:243: rathacakracitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_12.11 ||
GV06apsulb_u:244: yāvān agniḥ sāratniprādeśas tāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ parimaṇḍalāṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvatsambhavet || ĀpŚus_12.12 ||
GV06apsulb_u:246: tāsāṃ ṣaṭ pradhāv upadhāya śeṣam aṣṭadhā vibhajet || ĀpŚus_13.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:249: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_13.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:251: dvayāni tu khalu droṇāni, caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca || ĀpŚus_13.5 ||
GV06apsulb_u:255: paścāt tsarur bhavaty anurūpatvāyeti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_13.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:256: sarvasyā bhūmer daśamaṃ tsarus tasya pucchena nirhāra uktaḥ || ĀpŚus_13.10
GV06apsulb_u:263: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāty uttarataś ca dakṣiṇās tsarupārśvayor dakṣiṇā utīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_13.15 ||
GV06apsulb_u:267: samūhyaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:271: paricāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.4 ||
GV06apsulb_u:274: upacāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.6 ||
GV06apsulb_u:276: śmaśānacitaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayet pitṛloka ṛdhnuyāmiti vijñāyate ||
GV06apsulb_u:277: dvayāni khalu śmamaśānāni caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca || ĀpŚus_14.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:283: chandaścitaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_14.13 ||
GV06apsulb_u:286: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_15.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:290: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_15.2b ||
GV06apsulb_u:293: tāsāṃ tisraḥ śira itarat pakṣayor vibhajet
GV06apsulb_u:298: ardhadaśamā aratnayo 'ṅgulayaś ca caturbhāgonāḥ pakṣāyāmaḥ || ĀpŚus_15.5
GV06apsulb_u:301: pakṣasyāparayoḥ koṭyor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena prācīnam āyacched evaṃ purastāt |
GV06apsulb_u:309: śirasy ardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇayor nipātayet apyayān prati śroṇyaṃsān apacchindyāt || ĀpŚus_16.1a ||
GV06apsulb_u:311: karaṇaṃ puruṣasya pañcamāyāmaṃ ṣaṣṭhavyāsaṃ kārayed yathāyoganataṃ tatprathamam || ĀpŚus_16.2
GV06apsulb_u:326: uttaraṃ tūttarasyāḥ koṭyālikhet tad aṣṭamam || ĀpŚus_16.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:328: upadhāne ṣaṣṭiḥṣaṣṭiḥ pakṣayoḥ prathamā udīcīrnir upadadhyāt ||
GV06apsulb_u:329: pucchapārśvayor aṣṭāvaṣṭau ṣaṭhyayas tisro 'gre tata ekān tatas tisraḥ tata ekā || ĀpŚus_16.12
GV06apsulb_u:332: śeṣe daśa caturthyaḥ śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_17.1
GV06apsulb_u:333: śeṣe ca ṣaḍviṃśatir aṣṭau ṣaṣṭayaś catasraḥ pañcamyaḥ || ĀpŚus_17.2 ||
GV06apsulb_u:338: apyayayoś ca tṛtīyā ātmānam aṣṭabhāgāvetāḥ || ĀpŚus_17.5a ||
GV06apsulb_u:343: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau caturthyo dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca || ĀpŚus_17.7a ||
GV06apsulb_u:344: śeṣe ca viṃśatis triṃśat ṣaṣṭhayaḥ ekāṃ pañcamīm || ĀpŚus_17.7b ||
GV06apsulb_u:345: śirasi caturthyau tayoś ca purastāccatasro navamyaḥ || ĀpŚus_17.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:347: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_17.10 ||
GV06apsulb_u:348: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate || ĀpŚus_18.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:352: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate ||
GV06apsulb_u:353: puruṣasya ṣoḍaśabhir viṃśaṃ śataṃ sāratniprādeśaḥ saptavidhaḥ saṃpadyate |
GV06apsulb_u:354: tāsāṃ catvāriṃśadātmani tisraḥ śirasi pañcadaśa puccha ekatriṃśad dakṣiṇe pakṣe tathottare adhyardhapuruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmata iti dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya śroṇyaṃsebhyo dve dve ṣoḍasyau nirasyet |
GV06apsulb_u:357: śirasyardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet tisraḥ pariśiṣyante |
GV06apsulb_u:359: puruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmataḥ ṣoḍaśabhāgaś ca dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ |
GV06apsulb_u:361: pakṣāgrepakṣāgre puruṣacaturthena catvāri caturaśrāṇi kṛtvā tāny akṣṇayā vyavalikhyārdhāni nirasyet |
GV06apsulb_u:363: pakṣāgram utsṛjya madhye pakṣasya prācīṃ lekhām ālikhet || ĀpŚus_18.8a ||
GV06apsulb_u:364: pakṣāpyaye puruṣaṃ niyamya lekhāyāṃ puruṣānte nitodantukuryāt |
GV06apsulb_u:365: nitodāt prācīnaṃ puruṣānte nitodaṃ nitodayor nānāntāv ālikhet |
GV06apsulb_u:368: dvipuruṣaṃ pascādardhapuruṣaṃ purastāc caturbhāgonaḥ puruṣa āyāmo
GV06apsulb_u:372: aṣṭamena tribhir aṣṭamaiś caturthena caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti || ĀpŚus_19.2b
GV06apsulb_u:375: pakṣeṣṭakāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti ||
GV06apsulb_u:376: pakṣamadhyīyāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti ||
GV06apsulb_u:377: pakṣāgrīyāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaptamābhyām ekaṃ caturthasaviśeṣasaptamābhyāṃ ceti || ĀpŚus_19.7 ||
GV06apsulb_u:386: apareṇaikādaśa pūrveṇa pucchāpyayaṃ pañcāpareṇa pañca pañcadaśa pucchāgre || ĀpŚus_19.9 ||
GV06apsulb_u:387: catasraścatasraḥ pakṣāgrīyāḥ pakṣāgrayoḥ pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayāḥ ||
GV06apsulb_u:388: tā ātmani catasṛbhiś catasṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśībhir yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt ||
GV06apsulb_u:393: aparasmin prastāre purastāc chirasi dve ṣoḍaśyau bāhyaviśeṣe upadadhyāt ||
GV06apsulb_u:397: ātmanaḥ karaṇīnāṃ sandhiṣu ṣoḍaśyo bāhyaviśeṣā upadadhyāt || ĀpŚus_20.8 ||
GV06apsulb_u:403: yac caturaśraṃ tryaśraṃ vā saṃpadyetārdheṣṭakābhiḥ pādeṣṭakābhir vā pracchādayet || ĀpŚus_20.12
GV06apsulb_u:405: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet || ĀpŚus_20.14 ||
GV06apsulb_u:406: kaṅkacid alajacid iti śyenacitā vyākhyātau || ĀpŚus_21.1 ||
GV06apsulb_u:407: evami va hi śyenasya varṣīyāṃsau pakṣau pucchād vakrau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ dīrgha ātmā maṇḍalaṃ śiraś ca |
GV06apsulb_u:411: kaṅkacitaṃ śīrṣaṇvantaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta saśīrṣo 'muṣmiṃl
GV06apsulb_u:412: loke saṃbhaveyam iti vidyamāne kathaṃ brūyāt || ĀpŚus_21.3 ||
GV06apsulb_u:413: prākṛtau vakrau pakṣau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ vikāraśravaṇāt || ĀpŚus_21.4a ||
GV06apsulb_u:419: dīrghacaturaśrāṇāṃ samāsena pakṣapucchānāṃ samāsa uktaḥ || ĀpŚus_21.8 ||
